sentences.en: A festival was held in her honor every year at the vernal equinox.
sentences.cn: 每年的春分时刻都有为她举行的节日.

sentences.en: According to northern hemisphere sky lore , the Harvest Moon is the closest full moon to equinox.
sentences.cn: 按照往常北半球气象学说中, 最近接秋分时刻的满月被称之为丰收之月.
星图的所有坐标皆以/(2000.0)为参考.

sentences.en: As the saying goes, " Vernal Equinox up wheat, fertilizer to keep up. "
sentences.cn: 俗话说 “ 春分麦起身, 肥水要紧跟 ”.

sentences.en: Equinox and Autumnal Equinox before and after the two solar terms, it bore more spectacular.
sentences.cn: 春分和秋分两个节气前后, 涌潮更为壮观而已.

sentences.en: In the Chinese calendar, the Spring Equinox always occurs in the second month.
sentences.cn: 在中国历法中，春分总是出现在2月。

sentences.en: Reduce eaves width to 42 - 43 percent of H to extend the heating season past the equinox.
sentences.cn: 把屋檐的宽度降低到高度的42% - 43%,来延长春分和秋分之外的取暖季节.

sentences.en: Spring Equinox Automn Equinox Daytime Equals Night.
The Autumnal Equinox is the best time for wheat - sowing.
The autumnal equinox is the point in the opposite direction of the vernal equinox.
sentences.cn: 与春分点相隔180°的另一点,就是秋分点.

sentences.en: The Equinox is available in LS , LT and LTZ trim, with standard FWD or optional AWD.
sentences.cn: 赤道提供镑,低温和莲塘早装饰, 与标准前进或可选全轮驱动系统.

sentences.en: The vernal equinox and autumnal equinox herald the beginning of spring and fall, respectively.
sentences.cn: 春分和秋分, 分别预告着春季和秋季的开始.

sentences.en: The zero point is the Vernal Equinox, also called the point of Aries.
sentences.cn: 零点是春分点, 也叫做白羊座点.

sentences.en: They are thought to have arisen with the celebrations of the vernal equinox.
sentences.cn: 人们认为他们是出自于庆祝春分的来临.

sentences.en: This is equinox week . about the balance between light and dark.
sentences.cn: 在这个昼夜平分日出现的星期里,主题就是光明与黑暗的平衡.

words.tran_cn: 昼夜平分的；春分或秋分时的；赤道的
赤道；春分或秋分时的暴风雨

phrases.tran_cn: n. 春分；春分点（约在3月20日）

trans.tran_cn: 昼夜平分点，春分或秋分
trans.tran_en: one of the two times in a year when night and day are of equal length
